title: Matt Fox from Shai Hulud
itunes:title: Matt Fox from Shai Hulud
description:
In this episode I visit with Matt Fox, the driving force behind metalcore pioneers Shai Hulud. We discuss his love for thrash metal, why women are so much better than men and his South Florida upbringing. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
